page.prototype: .CopyItemTo as L (SourceItemName as C, TargetContainer as A5Storage::DataContainer, TargetItemName as C)

argument.name: TargetItemName
argument.description: The name to give the item when saved in the destination Container.

return.name: Result
return.description: Returns .T. if the operation succeeds, otherwise .F. (see .CallResult for additional error information.)

page.description: Copies one item in a container to another container.
page.example:
dim Container as A5Storage::DataContainer = null_value() dim TargetContainer as A5Storage::DataContainer = null_value()
CallResult = A5Storage::DataContainer::Open(Container, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot';") ? CallResult.Success = .T.
CallResult = A5Storage::DataContainer::Open(TargetContainer, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot2';") ? CallResult.Success = .T.
?Container.CopyItemTo(TargetContainer, "MyTargetPath/MyObject") = .T.
